Docs.summary: Specifies the cryptographic operations that a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) key may be used with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Not all operations apply to each key. For example, an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) key cannot be used for decryption even if the Decryption usage is set.
